title: Knee Pull-in
instruction: Lift a leg up and parallel to floor. Draw knee in toward abdoment.

title: Side Leg Lift
instruction: Lie on your right-hand side with your right knee bent at 90 degrees, and your left leg straight and in line with your back. Press your left fingers into the top of your buttock to keep your left hip slightly tilting forward. Raise your left leg as far as you can without letting your hips tilt back. Slowly lower to the starting position.

title: Squat
instruction: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands down by your sides, or stretched out in front for extra balance. Lower yourself by bending your knees until they're nearly at a right angle, with your thighs parallel to the floor

title: Obliques
instruction: Lie down on your back with your knees bent and together, and feet off the floor. Place your right hand behind your right ear and extend the left arm out. Keeping your lower back pressed into the floor, lift your shoulder blades off the floor and curl your upper body diagonally across your chest towards your left knee and lower down

title: Lunges
instruction: Stand in a split stance, with your right leg forward and left leg back. Slowly bend the knees, lowering into a lunge until both legs are nearly at right angles. Keeping the weight on your heels, push back up to starting position

title: Lunge Lift
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hands on hips. Lunge back with left leg, crossing left foot behind right; bend both knees 90 degrees. Push off with left foot to bring left bent knee to hip level in front of you. Hold for 2 counts; return to curtsy lunge.

title: Bridges
instruction: Lie on your back with your knees bent and heels close to your bottom. Your feet should be shoulder-width apart and flat on the floor.Raise your hips to create a straight line from your knees to your shoulders. As you come up, tighten your abdominals and buttocks. Lower yourself gently to the starting position.

title: Curtsy Lunge
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hands on hips. Lunge back with left leg, crossing left foot behind right; bend both knees 90 degrees, keeping right knee directly above right ankle. Return to start.

title: Curl Up
instruction: Lie down, arms by side, knees bent, feet up. Curl tailbone off floor, keeping knees bent.

title: Side Squat
instruction: tart standing with feet hip distance apart and sit back into a squat position by bending the knees.Keep your abs tight and back straight. Step wide to one side staying in your squat position, go back to your starting position, and then side squat wide in the other direction using all your lower body muscles then back to center.

title: Plank
instruction: Lie on your front propped up on your forearms and toes. Keep your legs straight and hips raised to create a straight and rigid line from head to toe. Your shoulders should be directly above your elbows. Focus on keeping your abs contracted during the exercise. Hold this position for 5 to 10 seconds.

title: Half Side Plank
instruction: Start with left arm under shoulder, feet staggered, hips lifted, glutes and abs tight. Lift arm straight up to ceiling, hold position and breathe.

title: Side Plank
instruction: Start with left arm under shoulder, feet staggered, hips lifted, glutes and abs tight. Lift arm straight up to ceiling, hold position and breathe.

title: Push Ups
instruction: Place your hands underneath your shoulders with your arms fully extended, palms flat and fingers facing forward. Keep your legs straight and knees off the floor. Bend your arms at your elbows, lowering your chest until it's 5cm above the floor and your elbows reach 90 degrees.

title: Front Raises
instruction: Keep arms straight and lift weights up so arm is parallel to floor. Return and repeat.

title: Bent Over Row
instruction: Stand, hinged forward at hip, straight back. Hands with weights are reaching to floor. Bend at elbows to pull weights up toward chest, squeeze shoulder blades together.

title: Front Press
instruction: Stand straight up holding one dumbbell in each hand. Lift weights up to chest level bending elbows. Straighten arms keeping them at chest level. Pull elbows back to start position

title: Bench dips
instruction: Sit on a stable chair with your hands gripping the edges either side of you. Inch your feet forwards to lift your bottom off the chair. Keep your knees hip-width apart and bent at 90 degrees. Lower yourself by bending your arms to about 90 degrees, keeping your elbows tucked in.

title: Biceps Curl
instruction: Stand with feet hip distance apart and parallel. Free weights in hands, arms at sides, palms up. Lift weight up by bending elbow and squeezing biceps, keep elbow tucked into side.

title: Hi Lo Plank
instruction: Begin in high plank position, arms under shoulders, weights in hands. Keeping abs tight, drop down to right elbow and then left elbow, keep body straight in low plank. Lift up to straighten right arm and then left arm.

title: Jump Squats
instruction: Stand with feet hip-width distance apart, feet slightly turned out. Perform a normal bodyweight squat, maintaining a tall spine and braced core. As soon as your hip sinks just below the knees, push your heels the floor by jumping as high as you can, and land softly on your feet.

title: Forward Knee
instruction: Stand up straight with abs tight. Lift one knee up as high as you can, keeping knee bend. Lower down with control and repeat on other side.

title: Jumping Rope
instruction: Hold both rope handles in one hand and swing the rope to develop a feel for the rhythm.
